job_title: Software Developer - Windows and Web Applications
job_purpose: Develop innovative Windows and web applications for enterprise-wide communications systems at Omnitronics.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop innovative Windows and web applications for enterprise-wide communications systems
Analyze requirements, design, specify, implement, and test software within an agile environment
Contribute to advancing the company's technology base
Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical colleagues
Utilize WinForms, WPF, and MVC for GUI development
Apply SOLID principles, design patterns, and software architecture
Utilize cloud hosting experience, particularly Azure
Utilize SQL, ORM tools, LINQ, and redundancy in database development
Have experience with DevOps, preferably TeamCity
Work with source control systems like GitHub, GitLab, etc.
required_qualifications: Minimum of 5 years of software development experience
Proficiency in C# and .NET Frameworks 4 and above
Positive, friendly, hardworking, and responsible attitude
Ability to independently analyze and solve complex problems
Flexibility with a focus on results and deliverables
Ability to learn and apply new skills and technology
Desire and ability to contribute in a team environment
Effective communication skills with technical and non-technical colleagues
preferred_qualifications: Tertiary Degree in software engineering/development or similar
Experience with WebAPI design and development
Database skills including SQL, ORM tools, LINQ, and redundancy
Familiarity with the Scrum Agile process
Experience with source control systems (GitHub, GitLab, etc.)
company_details: Omnitronics develops and provides advanced communications technology to vital industries like resources, ports, emergency services, private, and public sectors on a global scale. The company offers a friendly and supportive work environment with opportunities for growth and development.
